skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

Attacks all enemies. Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns. Places two 15% [Continuous Heal] buffs on this Champion for 1 turn. Increases the duration of all ally buffs by 1 turn.
Places a [Provoke] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn. Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies except this Champion for 2 turns.
At the start of each Round, places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns equal to 50% of this Championâ€™s MAX HP. Has a 75% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff and a 50% [Decrease ATK]
books: debuff on the attacker for 1 turn when hit.
